subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Eli Manning will make his 46th consecutive start for the Giants on Sunday. But 2007 is shaping up as the Year of the Backup. So why shouldn’t Jared Lorenzen revisit every play in the book?
snippet: Eli Manning will make his 46th consecutive start for the Giants on Sunday. But 2007 is shaping up as the Year of the Backup. So why shouldn’t Jared Lorenzen revisit every play in the book?
